summary: Water quality is stable but temperature is lower than average, which may affect plant growth and fish metabolism.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH around 6.8 to 7.2 for optimal tilapia and plant health.
Monitor TDS levels; consider water changes if it approaches 400 ppm.
Increase water temperature to around 25-28°C for optimal growth.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.035 / 7.008 / 7.106 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 330.291 / 307.8 / 339.7 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.168 / 21.5 / 29.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
